extendedInfo.description: âSingapore Prayerâ is a utility application for Singapore Muslims.The Majlis Ugama Islam Singapura (MUIS) provides authoritative data for Muslim prayer times and other Islamic information in Singapore.The prayer and fasting time data is freely available from MUIS website www.muis.gov.sg.This application is based on the above mentioned data, but makes it little easier to browse and look-up.Also, this application can work without internet connection as the data is stored locally.As the application also provides fasting information (Ramadhan/Imsakiah 2013), we hope that it will be useful for a quick look-up.âSingapore Prayerâ does not require any special permissions and does not have any ads.Planned Updates: 1) Qiblah compass2) Look and FeelOlder Change log:Version 17.0Ramadan 2012 information addedVersion 16.0Non-working. Removed.Version 15.0Widget 4x1 - always shows the next prayer timeWidget 4x4 - shows all prayer times for todayFont size adjustment on user request for smaller screens (like X10 mini pro)Version 14.0Non-working - removedVersion 13.0Support for smaller Screens (like X10 mini pro)Smaller font option even for bigger screens (Menu->Settings)Improved stabilityVersion 12.0Alarm follows changing Prayer timeBetter theme and usabilityMajor rewrite of code-baseImproved stabilityRemoved ability to install on SD as it caused lost alarmsVersion 11.0Installs to SDBug fix: complete data clearVersion 10.0Added Fajr AdhanAdded year 2012 dataAdded Settings menuFont color controlVersion 9.0Fixed Zuhur Alarm bugReplaced Adhan audioImproved stabilityVersion 8.0Added addresses of Mosques in SingaporeAdded support for locating mosque address on a Google map Version 7.0Notification sound defaults to Beep if Adhan notification is not selected.Version 6.0Improved stability.No more FC on any menu click.Version 5.0Added Adhan Audio (as notification as well as on demand)fixed crashing bugfixed alarm bugAlarms are restored properly after system rebootVersion 4.0Added EidulFitri Prayer times in Singapore Mosques.Version 3.0Added support for landscape mode.The main screen as well as the Alarm dialog can scroll in the landscape mode.Version 2.0Added support for Notification/AlarmThe alarm can be set either as one-time (default) or recurring every 24 hours.If selected as one-time, the alarm will go back to disabled state once the Notification is shown.

reviews.title: Well done
reviews.comment: A good and simple app.. but could u ease add other muazzins like the one from Mekah, please..  And there is no compass for kiblat..  Overall a good job..  well done..
reviews.author: Zulfadli Yahya

reviews.title: Good..
reviews.comment: Assalamu\'alaikum,, Terima kasih atas aplikasi nya,, Semoga allah,, Membalas kebaikan anda. Ini sangat membantu umat muslim di singapore.
reviews.author: Sri Limpung

reviews.comment: I am using experia spand once I have donr the updated software on my phone, it didnt azan if it is in the sleep mode.\tDoesnt azan on time when my mobile is on sleep mode. Am using experia sp.
